The Flintstones & WWE: Stone Age Smackdown

Ano: 2015

IMDb ID: tt2948202

Classificação: 5.4

Sinopse: When Fred loses his family's vacation money, he hatches one of his hair brained plans to get it back. It's a sports entertainment spectacle that involves throwing his best bud, Barney into the wrestling ring with the likes of John Cenastone, Rey Mysteriopal and even The Undertaker, with Fred himself as event promoter. The crowds roar, the "clams" are pouring in from ticket sales and even Mr. McMagma is taking notice of all the hoopla. Including all-star appearances from The Boulder Twins Marble Henry and Daniel Bry-Rock, it's time to get the whole family together for hard-hitting, side-splitting laughs from the most epic event in all of prehistory. Plus new bonus content The Superstars of Fred Flintstone Entertainment, How to be a Stone Age Superstar.
